name: LA Craft: Fun Games, Crafting & Exploration 3D
name_original: LA Craft: Fun Games, Crafting & Exploration 3D
description:
How about selfie in front of the Hollywood Sign? Or take your friends to the Hollywood Walk of Fame! Los Angeles is sunny paradise and you can even improve it! Build your own blocky theme park, swim in the pixel Ocean and explore LA in one of the best city building games! Crafting & building fun games for free – only in LA Craft!

Build & craft!
Become a professional house builder born in the USA! Create a whole pixel and blocky world in american way. Ever wonder what’s like to redesign LA metro? Now you can because you’re a real city builder! Exploration is a wonderful experience. Subway is great but don’t forget about the Hollywood Sign or the Hollywood Walk of Fame!

Play fun games for free!
Welcome to LA! Build a city as you want or start an exploration! Adventure could be exhausting, so enjoy beautiful minigame maps. Build an empire of blocky fun games for free! Play free games and enjoy building of awesome world!

Date boys in girl games!
Find a boyfriend or girlfriend during house party in the love city! Look for friends or pick up girls and boys to chat and meet them in romantic places like Hollywood or Malibu. Take them to the theme park and play cool games there! Simulator games for free let you have a second life! Play fun games for free – like LA Craft!

House party time!
cool games for girls and boys let you have a great time! Organize a real house party =or take your friends to water park or go on the rollercoaster ride! Los Angeles Theme Park is a place of cute games like dancing quest or fun games like arm wrestling and many else! Play girl games in the crafting & building world!

Play free games!
Use your crafting & building skills in one of the best simulator games for free! Build a whole theme park, ride a rollercoaster, dress up for a house party and enjoy dating games with boyfriends and girlfriends!

LA Craft features:
🎥 Fun games – theme park building!
🎥 Girl games for free – dress up and throw a house party!
🎥 Cute games – find the love of your life! Exterior & interior design craft with many blocks!
🎥 Simulator games – build a whole new city!
🎥 Iconic places like the Hollywood Sign or the Hollywood Walk of Fame!

Play LA Craft for free – one of fun games of 2019. Download now and find your own star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame… or build it!
